name: The Hardest Game You'll Ever Play
name_original: The Hardest Game You'll Ever Play
description:
Imagine an NES game. Now make it 3D.

Introducing The Hardest Game You'll Ever Play, the game that combines NES style gameplay with a 3D platformer.

Take control of Bob, a rabbit on a quest to get his wallet back from a cat inside of a video game! Play 3 challenging levels (or y'know, not-so-challenging if you're a total MLG pro.) all using different gameplay elements!

This game is a prototype. This was made to act as an introduction to Bob The Rabbit. Look forward to more games with this character! (Perhaps even a sequal with loads more content if demands are high. *wink* *wink* *nudge* *nudge*)
